This post is entirely dedicated to Oneplus 3T device

Kernels:-

  1. Mady’s Xtended Kernel

Gcam:-

Gapps:-

  1. Opengapps.org

Choose “Arm64” , “8.1 or 9.0” and “nano or pico”

Magisk:-

How to Download Best Modules

Recommended Apps:-

  1. Helix Engine

  2. Greenify

  3. Kernel Auditor

  4. Ex Kernel Manager

  5. Franco Kernel Manager

  6. Spectrum

Try this Combinations:-

  1. NitrogenOs(NOS)+Caesium kernel+Helix Engine

  2. LineageOs(LOS)+Franco Kernel

  3. LineageOs(LOS)+Boeffla Kernel

  4. Havoc 2.0+Caesium kernel+Helix Engine

  5. StatixOs+Caesium kernel+Helix Engine
